title: Building Bridges ! The Idea Behind the Innovation
text:
Introducing Aquainsight – a Water Quality Management System developed in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Water Board and JRDC. This system empowers Water Board teams with
🔍 Real-time Monitoring of critical water quality parameters

📊 Predictive Analytics for early detection of contamination risks

⚙️ Smart Management Tools to streamline decision-making and incident response

By integrating machine learning and IoT technologies, the platform enables proactive water quality assurance and supports the Water Board’s mission of delivering clean, reliable water.
